feed.title: Dimitris Georgoulas
feed.subtitle: This is my personal blog which I intent to use both as a showcase of my work experience and as a means by which I can express myself, writing for anything I consider interesting or important. You will find posts on python, django, javascript, react.js, computer science, artificial intelligence and economics.
